trans-unit.source: Specifies constants that define which mouse button was pressed.
trans-unit.target: 指定定義已按下哪個滑鼠鍵的常數。

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used by many classes, including <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase>.
trans-unit.target: 這個列舉型別由許多類別，包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost>

trans-unit.source: The left mouse button was pressed.
The middle mouse button was pressed.

trans-unit.target: 已按不下任何滑鼠按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The right mouse button was pressed.

trans-unit.target: 第一個 XButton 已按下。

trans-unit.source: With Windows 2000, Microsoft is introducing support for the Microsoft IntelliMouse Explorer, which is a mouse with five buttons.
trans-unit.target: Windows 2000，Microsoft 引進 Microsoft intellimouse 滑鼠總管 中，也就是具有五個按鈕的滑鼠支援。

trans-unit.source: The two new mouse buttons (XBUTTON1 and XBUTTON2) provide backward/forward navigation.
trans-unit.target: 兩個新滑鼠按鈕 （XBUTTON1 和 XBUTTON2） 提供回溯/向前巡覽。
第二個 XButton 已按下。

trans-unit.source: With Windows 2000, Microsoft is introducing support for the Microsoft IntelliMouse Explorer, which is a mouse with five buttons.
trans-unit.target: Windows 2000，Microsoft 引進 Microsoft intellimouse 滑鼠總管 中，也就是具有五個按鈕的滑鼠支援。

trans-unit.source: The two new mouse buttons (XBUTTON1 and XBUTTON2) provide backward/forward navigation.
trans-unit.target: 兩個新滑鼠按鈕 （XBUTTON1 和 XBUTTON2） 提供回溯/向前巡覽。
